LanguageData.TR_namemessage: Male Title (Put None in both boxes to reset to default)
LanguageData.TR_namemessage2: Female Title (Remove to disable and use male title for both)
LanguageData.TR_managetitles_update_tooltip: Refreshes the title cache and applies your changes, also applies realmtype if you've changed the settings.
LanguageData.TR_managetitles_resetcustom_notif: Custom Titles have been reset, click Update Titles to refresh the list.
LanguageData.TR_managetitles_resetcustom_tooltip: Resets all custom titles back to their normal names
LanguageData.TR_selectorexplanation: All Empire changes is the King title to Emperor\nRoman is based on Late Roman Empire, Roman Alt is contributed by Alexey Stukov#2163\nRussian, Byzantine and Nordic Titles coming soon
LanguageData.TR_changedtitle: Changed Title, save and load your colony to apply.
LanguageData.TR_reloadsavefix: Make sure to save and reload if you're in the game to apply the changes.
